rationale: The segment reports where infections have been but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Most of the infections [avian influenza infections] to date have been at free-range egg producers.

rationale: This is a factual statement about where infections have occurred, without using high-potency language.
statement_text: Most of the infections [avian influenza infections] to date have been at free-range egg producers.
